title: Fatal shooting at Burbank hotel ruled an accident
content:
Authorities have determined the shooting death earlier this month of a 34-year-old man outside the Los Angeles Burbank Airport Marriott Hotel was an accident.
The Los Angeles County coroner’s office said Justin Malone was killed Nov. 10 when a gun he had in his wheelchair fell to the ground and discharged a bullet that struck him in the head.
Officers found him on the ground in the hotel’s valet-parking area. He was pronounced dead at the scene by paramedics.
Join the conversation on Facebook >>
A GoFundMe page has been set up on behalf of the family to help raise funds for a memorial and burial.
--
Andy Nguyen, andy.nguyen@latimes.com
